citations.narrative:
The facility has a Contingency Plan in place, however annual reviews are not being documented. Contingency plans must
be reviewed at least annually to ensure it adequately addresses the criteria listed in paragraph (a) of this section and is
still relevant to the facility and animals. The facility must review the contingency plan at least once a year and maintain
documentation of the review.
*******Corrected on 8/14/25
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.134(b) 
   
Contingency planning. 
The facility has a Contingency Plan in place, however annual reviews are not being documented. Contingency plans must 
be reviewed at least annually to ensure it adequately addresses the criteria listed in paragraph (a) of this section and is 
still relevant to the facility and animals. The facility must review the contingency plan at least once a year and maintain 
documentation of the review. 
*******Corrected on 8/14/25 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
